articles.description: More details about the expansion will be revealed in the coming months
articles.content:
BBC bosses have announced plans to extend Bristol's studio as part of the broadcaster's 'biggest' shake-up in decades.
Over the next six years, there's going to be a massive shift away from London -… [+4078 chars]

articles.title: Sarah Harding reveals she wants to have 'FFS' as her gravestone epitaph - Daily Mail
articles.description: In an extract from her new autobiography, Hear Me Out, the former Girls Aloud star, 39, insisted she would want 'FFS' as her epitaph to represent her 'most used phrase' during her battle.
articles.content:
Sarah Harding has admitted she's thought about her grave, after saying Christmas 2020 was 'probably her last'.

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Oscars 2021 ceremony will be in-person and Zoom-free, producers say - The Guardian
articles.description: Academy Awards producers have insisted video-link will ‘not be an option’ for attendees in the wake of ratings slumps for other recent major awards shows
articles.content:
The Oscars ceremony in April will be an intimate, in-person gathering, held without Zoom and limited to nominees, presenters and their guests, the producers said on Thursday.

articles.author: James Rodger
articles.title: Good Morning Britain loses 100,000 more viewers as Piers Morgan announces ITV return - Birmingham Live
articles.description: Piers, 55, walked away from his role on the show last Tuesday - after a blazing on air row with Alex Beresford, GMB's weather presenter
articles.content:
Good Morning Britain has shed a whopping 100,000 more viewers, leaving the ITV daytime TV show in chaos since Piers Morgan quit.
